Synopsis
-=-=--=-=-

Episode #. Episode Title. Story by. Written by. Original US airdate. Production code 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

38 "All the Best People Are Mad" TBA TBA  November 26, 2011  TBA  TBA 212
 
Schoolmate Rhona Irwin turns Tomorrow Academy into a lethal maze of traps for Tony and his schoolmates while her twin brother Andy turns out to be very unexpectedly lethal as well.

NOTE: Dr. Henry Pym is specifically mentioned as the scientist who developed but lost the shrinking "Pym particles" (though he does not appear on camera). No specific mention of Ant-man is made.  

[b]Note[/b]
A big TYVM to Shugo for capping this for me.
